readable.title: 3590653633_495de5f288
readable.content: A boy and a man dressed as rodeo clowns standing in sand A rodeo clown ties a rope around an older rodeo clown as he sits in the dirt . Two rodeo clowns are looking at something in the distance . Two rodeo clowns are on the dirt . Two rodeo clowns , one young and one an adult , waiting their ques .
